product.description: The GNC Fish Body Oil capsules are packed with essential omega-3 fatty acids, which are crucial for maintaining good health throughout your life. The capsules are a rich source of EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid), the two main forms of omega-3 fatty acids. Regular intake of these beneficial fatty acids can potentially ward off serious health conditions and complications, making these capsules an attractive choice. Pregnant women will find it particularly helpful, as omega-3 fats support proper foetal brain and neurological development. GNC Fish Body Oil capsules provide a convenient solution to meet the daily needs of nutrients, especially when our regular diet falls short. People seeking optimal heart health, joint support, dry eye relief or athletes; and even the elderly can benefit from their use.FeaturesFormulated with fish oilContains two types of omega-3 fatty acids; EPA and DHASupports heart, brain, eye, skin and joint health90 softgel capsulesMulti-step purified
keyBenefits: Promotes heart well-being: Regular intake of omega-3 fatty acids in the form of these Fish Body Oil capsules contributes to optimal heart health. They help in maintaining a healthy cardiovascular system and reducing the likelihood of heart issues.

Enhances joint support: These Fish Body Oil capsules can be beneficial for individuals experiencing joint inflammation or seeking joint support. The presence of omega-3 fatty acids aids in improving joint flexibility and reducing inflammation.

Alleviate dry eye symptoms: If you're troubled by dry eyes, these Fish Body Oil capsules might be your solution. Omega-3 fatty acids present in them have been studied to alleviate dry eye symptoms by increasing tear production and quality.

Assists in healthy ageing: For the elderly, these Fish Body Oil capsules can offer various health benefits. From supporting heart health to promoting brain function and eye health, they can assist in maintaining overall well-being during ageing.

Boosts athletes' health: Athletes or individuals involved in intense physical activities may also benefit from these Fish Body Oil capsules. Omega-3 fatty acids are known to enhance muscle strength and performance, facilitating better outcomes for athletes.

Supports foetal development: Pregnant women can significantly benefit from the intake of these Fish Body Oil capsules. The contained omega-3 fatty acids are essential for proper foetal brain and neurological development, adding another reason why their intake becomes significant during pregnancy.

faqs.question: Do Fish Body Oil capsules contain added flavouring agents?
faqs.answer: Yes, Fish Body Oil capsules contain added flavouring agents. Individuals with sensitivities or preferences regarding added flavours should take this into consideration before consuming the product.

faqs.question: Can I take these Fish Body Oil capsules with my prescribed medications?
faqs.answer: It's always wise to consult your doctor before combining Fish Body Oil capsules with prescribed medication. Your doctor can assess potential interactions and ensure the safety and efficacy of the combination for your specific health needs.

faqs.question: Can I take Fish Body Oil capsules if I am allergic to shellfish?
faqs.answer: If you have a seafood allergy, it's crucial to consult your doctor before considering Fish Body Oil capsules. Your doctor can assess potential risks and offer personalised advice based on your allergy and health status.

faqs.question: Can I take these capsules if I am pregnant?
faqs.answer: It is recommended to always consult your doctor before starting any supplement during pregnancy for personalised advice based on your specific condition.
